  • Classes in org.glassfish.enterprise.iiop.api used by com.sun.ejb.containers 
    Class and Description
    GlassFishORBHelper
    This class exposes any orb/iiop functionality needed by modules in the app server.
    ProtocolManager
    The ProtocolManager interface specifies the functionality of the remote communication layer, which provides the support for distribution described in Chapter 13 of the EJB spec.
    RemoteReferenceFactory
    The RemoteReferenceFactory interface provides methods to create and destroy remote EJB references.
  • Classes in org.glassfish.enterprise.iiop.api used by com.sun.enterprise.iiop.security 
    Class and Description
    GlassFishORBHelper
    This class exposes any orb/iiop functionality needed by modules in the app server.
    IIOPInterceptorFactory 
    IIOPSSLUtil
    This class tries to avoid the need for orb-iiop to depend on some security modules for getting SSL related info
